title: Add a comment — add_comment
text: comment text comment. Markdown elements supported. issue issue key. Defaults project directory base name, assuming R project named issue key.

Assigns an issue to a user — assign_issue
text: name username assign issue issue key. Defaults project directory base name, assuming R project named issue key.

title: Assigns an issue to a user — assign_issue
Attach a file — attach_file
text: x path file attach issue issue key. Defaults project directory base name, assuming R project named issue key. add_date TRUE, appends today's date attached file name

title: Authenticate JIRA credentials — authenticate_jira
text: Store JIRA credentials system credential store.

title: Authenticate JIRA credentials — authenticate_jira
text: Stores JIRA username password system's credential store. Authentication RESTful API calls persist R session.

title: Create an issue — create_issue
text: project jira project name summary summary issue description detailed description issue issuetype issue type, .e. "Task", "Bug", "Improvement", etc.

title: Returns a comment — get_comment
text: id ID comment issue issue key. Defaults project directory base name, assuming R project named issue key.
